title: Snacktime: LSD And Hot Sauce
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Ben and Josh trade favorite Reddit stories about an Englishman whose bad LSD trip leads to a months-long French charade and a job seeker whose interview tactics leave him spitting fire...but not in a good way.
